executeCommand:
pandoc index/{filename}.md -f markdown
 -t html -s -o index/{filename}.html --metadata title="Release {filename}"
 --include-in-header="head.html" --include-before-body="before.html"
 --include-after-body="after.html" --css="https://cdn.icnet.dev/web/mcicn/patchnotes/css/basic.css"
 --css="https://cdn.icnet.dev/web/mcicn/patchnotes/css/after.css"
 --css="https://cdn.icnet.dev/web/mcicn/patchnotes/css/before.css"
